channel.title: Howto for Password Reset for Kicksecure Root Account
channel.description: Helo, Kicksecure is installed on a rather old MAC. User- and Root (Sysmaint-) account have different passwords for login. I don't know why but anyhow the password for sysmaint seems to be wrong, so I can't login. Access for user is still ok. Obviously editing Recovery Mode like in other distros is no longer possible as a precondition to set a new password. Is there another rather simple, direct way to reset the sysmaint password and set a new one? Thanks for help in advance.
